    public class BaseRecyclerView<Holder extends BaseRecyclerView.BaseViewHolder,Info>
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
    RecyclerView的二次封装 简单切换普通ListView、GridView、StaggeredGridView，只需要to一下 Created by TJbaobao on 2018/1/6.
